DefaultEvent.Description: See what remains. You've won no favour with the Khanate here today - take whatever you can.
DefaultEvent.Name: What's in the hold?

ChildBranches.Name: Seize and loot her!
ChildBranches.Description: Take what you can. Imprison or cut down any Khaganians that remain.

DefaultEvent.Description: Tactics, manoeuvres, weapons. So similar, and yet so different. You can learn from this.
DefaultEvent.Name: A bounty of experience!

RareDefaultEvent.Description: Tactics, manoeuvres, weapons... and a few items of particular interest to the Admiralty.
RareDefaultEvent.Name: A bounty of intelligence!

ChildBranches.Name: Record any Observations
ChildBranches.Description: If you've gathered enough, you may learn something...

Description: Shattered, listing. Seize what you can.
Name: You've destroyed a War Trimaran
